kpi.name: M1002C602

kpi_info.title: DL DCH SELECTED FOR STREAMING DUE TO HSDPA POWER
kpi_info.use: The number of times when the HS-DSCH downlink transport channel cannot be selected for a streaming class connection due to downlink power limits. UPDATED: When the HS-DSCH cannot be selected as a downlink transport channel due to PtxTotal>PtxTargetHSDPA or PtxNC>PtxTargetHSDPA conditions.

kpi.kpi_alias: DL DCH SELECTED FOR STREAMING DUE TO HSDPA POWER
